protocol_name: Gene expression analysis for browning in murine subcutaneous and gonadal fat tissues and for steatosis and fibrosis in liver tissues.
protocol_name_html: Gene expression analysis for browning in murine subcutaneous and gonadal fat tissues and for steatosis and fibrosis in liver tissues.
description: ADAMTS5, the main aggrecanase, is a protein that appears to play a functional role in development of white adipose tissue (WAT) and brown adipose tissue (BAT) and in browning of WAT.  ADAMTS5 deficient or knockout (ADAMTS5-/- or KO) mice indeed showed lower WAT mass, higher mass of interscapular BAT and enhanced browning of WAT, as indicated by elevated uncoupling-protein-1 (UCP-1) levels. In addition, ADAMTS5-/- mice appeared to be protected from non-alcoholic steatohepatitis (NASH) when kept on a Western type diet. These observations were made with the ADAMTS5-/--P mice originally generated by Pfizer, in collaboration with Lexicon Genetics. To provide confirmation of these observations, we have obtained a second strain of ADAMTS5 deficient mice, generated independently by Deltagen Inc.
before_start:
All reagents (except DNAse) should be at RT; WORK QUICKLY@@

  • Dry ice
  • 2 ml collection tubes (1/sample)
  • 1.5 ml Eppendorftubes (3/sample, 1 included in kit)
  • Pure ethanol
  • Ethanol (70% v/v) in RNAse free water (Molecular Biology Reagent W4502, Sigma-Aldrich, 35 ml ethanol + 15 ml water)
  • Qiagen Rneasy Mini kit (Catalog number 74106)
  • Qiagen RLT buffer: add 10 µl β-mercatoethanol (powder room, toxic: wear gloves and use hood) per 1 ml RLT buffer (stable for 1 month)
  • Qiagen RPE buffer (check if ethanol has been added)
  • RNAse-free DNAse I set (Qiagen: 79254): dissolve solid DNAse in 550 µl water provided in kit, DO NOT VORTEX, store at -20°C, thaw on ice. Make working solution: 10µl DNase stock solution (thaw on ice) + 70 µl RDD buffer (provided in kit) for each sample, mix by inverting (do not vortex). Perform on ice.
  • Clean bench first with dreft and then with ethanol
  • Clean eppendorf centrifuge: take out rotor, clean with dreft, rinse with hot water, rinse with ethanol and dry.
  • Write Lysing matrix D tubes (MP Biomedicals).
warning: -RNA extraction is performed in a fume hood when working with samples that contain β-mercaptoethanol.
manuscript_citation: Bauters D, Bedossa P, Lijnen HR, Hemmeryckx B (2018) Functional role of ADAMTS5 in adiposity and metabolic health. PLoS ONE 13(1): e0190595. doi: 10.1371/journal.pone.0190595
guidelines:
-RNA should be as pure as possible: OD260/280 between 1.8 – 2.0 and OD260/230 between 1.8 – 2.0. For sWAT and GON the OD260/230 is sometimes lower than 1.8. Still these samples are used.
-Volume of cDNA mix depends on the number genes of which the expression will be analyzed. E.g. 4 genes, 2µl/RT-PCR reaction, 2 technical replicates = 16µl; then 25µl is enough.

-Multiscribe enzyme: add enzyme last and keep it in a cold -20°C box.

components.data:
Make sure portion sizes of murine tissues are appropriate for the amount of RNA the RNAeasy column (RNAeasy kit) can hold:

-sWAT: 100 mg

-GON WAT: 100 mg

-Liver: 30 mg
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Make sure portion sizes of murine tissues are appropriate for the amount of RNA the RNAeasy column (RNAeasy kit) can hold:

-sWAT: 100 mg

-GON WAT: 100 mg

-Liver: 30 mg

components.data: Add 600µl RLT buffer (provided in RNAeasy kit) containing β-mercaptoethanol to each labeled 2 ml Lysing matrix D tube. Put on regular ice!
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 600µl RLT buffer (provided in RNAeasy kit) containing β-mercaptoethanol to each labeled 2 ml Lysing matrix D tube. Put on regular ice!

components.data: Transfer tissues with an ethanol swapped forceps to the corresponding labeled 2 ml Lysing matrix D tube on ice.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Transfer tissues with an ethanol swapped forceps to the corresponding labeled 2 ml Lysing matrix D tube on ice.

components.data: Homogenize sample in the Fastprep-24 (speed: 6 for 40 sec; MP Biomedicals): push button (back Ribolyzer), take out first platform, put tubes on second, push 2nd platform in, put first platform on head of tubes. Fix head on rotor, turn until you hear a sound. Set speed. Press run. Take out samples by putting entire platform on ice. Then transfer tubes one by one on ice.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Homogenize sample in the Fastprep-24 (speed: 6 for 40 sec; MP Biomedicals): push button (back Ribolyzer), take out first platform, put tubes on second, push 2nd platform in, put first platform on head of tubes. Fix head on rotor, turn until you hear a sound. Set speed. Press run. Take out samples by putting entire platform on ice. Then transfer tubes one by one on ice.

components.data: Homogenize a second time: speed 4 for 40 sec. Put samples on ice.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Homogenize a second time: speed 4 for 40 sec. Put samples on ice.

components.data: Centrifuge homogenized samples at room temperature for 3 min at 13,000 rpm (will give a nice fat layer for fat tissues so it is easy to separate)
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Centrifuge homogenized samples at room temperature for 3 min at 13,000 rpm (will give a nice fat layer for fat tissues so it is easy to separate)

components.data: Transfer the clear homogenate (45° angle, remove the supernatant even through the beads layer but avoid the upper white material) into a new eppendorftube.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Transfer the clear homogenate (45° angle, remove the supernatant even through the beads layer but avoid the upper white material) into a new eppendorftube.

components.data: Add 600µl ethanol (50% for liver tissues, 70% for fat tissues) to each tube containing the homogenates. Mix immediately by pipetting and transfer to the RNAeasy spin column (max. 700 µl and provided by the RNAeasy mini kit).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 600µl ethanol (50% for liver tissues, 70% for fat tissues) to each tube containing the homogenates. Mix immediately by pipetting and transfer to the RNAeasy spin column (max. 700 µl and provided by the RNAeasy mini kit).

components.data: Centrifuge 30 sec at 10,000 rpm at room temperature; discard flow-through (50 ml tube).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Centrifuge 30 sec at 10,000 rpm at room temperature; discard flow-through (50 ml tube).

components.data: Apply the rest of the sample and centrifuge 30 sec at 10,000 rpm at room temperature. Discard flow-through.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Apply the rest of the sample and centrifuge 30 sec at 10,000 rpm at room temperature. Discard flow-through.

components.data: Add 350µl of RW1 buffer (provided in kit) to each column (take fresh tip each time).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 350µl of RW1 buffer (provided in kit) to each column (take fresh tip each time).

components.data: Centrifuge for 30 sec at 10,000 rpm at room temperature.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Centrifuge for 30 sec at 10,000 rpm at room temperature.

components.data: Add 80µl DNAse I working solution directly onto the membrane (drop in middle of the membrane) and incubate for 15 min at room temperature (fresh tip each sample).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 80µl DNAse I working solution directly onto the membrane (drop in middle of the membrane) and incubate for 15 min at room temperature (fresh tip each sample).

components.data: Add 350µl of RW1 buffer to each column.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 350µl of RW1 buffer to each column.

components.data: Use a new tube to collect flow-through.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Use a new tube to collect flow-through.

components.data: Centrifuge for 30 sec at 10,000 rpm at room temperature, discard flow-through.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Centrifuge for 30 sec at 10,000 rpm at room temperature, discard flow-through.

components.data: Add 500µl RPE buffer (provided in kit) to each column.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 500µl RPE buffer (provided in kit) to each column.

components.data: Centrifuge for 30 sec at 10,000 rpm at room temperature, discard flow-through.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Centrifuge for 30 sec at 10,000 rpm at room temperature, discard flow-through.

components.data: Add another 500µl RPE buffer to each column.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add another 500µl RPE buffer to each column.

components.data: Centrifuge for 2 min at 10,000 rpm at room temperature, discard flow-through, use a new tube.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Centrifuge for 2 min at 10,000 rpm at room temperature, discard flow-through, use a new tube.

components.data: Centrifuge for 1 min at 13,200 rpm at room temperature.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Centrifuge for 1 min at 13,200 rpm at room temperature.

components.data: Transfer the column in a new 1.5 ml Eppendorf tube and add xµl RNAse-free water (provided by RNAeasy Mini kit) directly onto each membrane (volume: sWAT, GON and liver: 30 µl)
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Transfer the column in a new 1.5 ml Eppendorf tube and add xµl RNAse-free water (provided by RNAeasy Mini kit) directly onto each membrane (volume: sWAT, GON and liver: 30 µl)

components.data: Centrifuge for 1 min at 10,000 rpm at room temperature (fresh tip for each sample).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Centrifuge for 1 min at 10,000 rpm at room temperature (fresh tip for each sample).

components.data: Keep DNA-free total RNA samples on ice and measure RNA concentration using the Nanodrop 2000C (Isogen Life Science)
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Keep DNA-free total RNA samples on ice and measure RNA concentration using the Nanodrop 2000C (Isogen Life Science)

components.data: Make a 10 ng/µl dilution with RNAse-free water of the DNA-free total RNA liver samples.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Make a 10 ng/µl dilution with RNAse-free water of the DNA-free total RNA liver samples.

components.data: Make complementary DNA from the total RNA samples using the Taqman Reverse Transcription Reagents: per sample combine 5.725µl RNAse-free water, 2.5µl 10x RT buffer (1x), 5.5µl MgCl2 solution, 4µl dNTPs mixture (2.5 mM each), 1.25µl 50 µM random hexamers (2.5 µM), 0.4µl 20U/µl RNAse inhibitors (0.32U/µl), 0.625µl 50U/µl Multiscribe enzyme (1.25U/µl) with 5µl 10 ng/µl total RNA.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Make complementary DNA from the total RNA samples using the Taqman Reverse Transcription Reagents: per sample combine 5.725µl RNAse-free water, 2.5µl 10x RT buffer (1x), 5.5µl MgCl2 solution, 4µl dNTPs mixture (2.5 mM each), 1.25µl 50 µM random hexamers (2.5 µM), 0.4µl 20U/µl RNAse inhibitors (0.32U/µl), 0.625µl 50U/µl Multiscribe enzyme (1.25U/µl) with 5µl 10 ng/µl total RNA.

components.data: Put samples in a 2720 Thermal Cycler (Applied Biosystems)
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Put samples in a 2720 Thermal Cycler (Applied Biosystems)

components.data: Cycling conditions are:-10 min 25°C-60 min 48°C-5 min 95°C-+4°C
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Cycling conditions are:-10 min 25°C-60 min 48°C-5 min 95°C-+4°C

components.data:
cDNA samples are applied in duplicate on the 96 well fast thermal cycling plate for each gene

 

* Thermo Fisher Scientific ref. 4366932 Optical 96 well fast thermal cycling plates, 200 pcs

components.data:
Prepare the RT-PCR mix for each Taqman gene expression assay and ppiet samples on cycling plate: for one sample combine 5µl Taqman fast universal PCR master mix, 0.5µl Taqman gene expression assay, 2.5µl water with 2µl cDNA mix.

 

* Thermo Fisher Scientific ref. 4364103 Taqman fast universal PCR master mix

* VWR Filtertip 20ul max rec axygen 960 REF 732-0652

* VWR Filtertip 200ul max rec axygen 960 REF 732-0655

* VWR Filtertip 1000ul REF 732-0863* VWR ART/ REACH 10ul Pipet tips REF 732-2221
